author: VNExplorer
title: ¿Cómo hacer un champú casero con romero para tener el cabello largo y brillante?
text: La planta de romero se ha ganado un espacio en la cultura popular desde hace un buen tiempo gracias a sus propiedades medicinales que muchos destacan. Al romero se le atribuye ser rico en compuestos flavonoides, terpenos y ácidos fenólicos que le proporcionan propiedades antioxidantes; además, es de fácil manipulación, por lo cual se puede emplear tanto en comidas como bebidas que ayudan a mejorar el sistema circulatorio, según reseña el portal Tua Saúde. Estos son los objetos que le pueden ayudar a atraer dinero con ayuda de la planta. Adicionalmente, tiene grandes beneficios para el cuidado del cabello. La revista UnCOMO destaca cuatro de ellos: Acción revitalizadora: un estudio realizado por la Universidad de Kindai en Osaka, Japón, aprobó los beneficios de aceite de romero en el cabello. Además de cubrir las canas de forma natural, ayuda a equilibrar la grasa del cuero cabelludo, sin alterar el pH. Combate la caspa: gracias a sus componentes, esta planta ayuda a combatir los hongos que suelen causar caspa. Aunque no reemplaza un tratamiento médico, algunas personas lo utilizan como complemento para mejorar los resultados. Romero Previene la caída: según el portal de salud y belleza Gastrolab, el romero ayuda a proteger el cabello y a estimular su crecimiento; además, esta hierba dilata los vasos sanguíneos, ocasionando que la irrigación en los folículos pilosos del cabello mejore y esto permite que el pelo se nutra de forma adecuada. Propiedades astringentes: si las personas tienen un cabello que tiende a engrasarse y a verse sucio de una manera muy rápida, lo mejor es un tratamiento con romero, ya que, gracias a sus propiedades astringentes, se conseguirá lucir una melena más suelta y menos aceitosa. Champú de romero Champú casero Aquí tienes una receta básica para hacer champú casero con romero. Este champú es ideal para fortalecer el cabello y estimular el crecimiento, gracias a las propiedades beneficiosas del romero. Ingredientes: - 2 tazas de agua - 2 cucharadas de romero seco (o 4 cucharadas de romero fresco) - 1 taza de jabón líquido neutro (puede ser jabón de castilla o cualquier otro jabón suave) - Opcional: unas gotas de aceite esencial de romero para un aroma más intenso y propiedades adicionales Instrucciones: - En una olla pequeña se debe calentar el agua hasta que esté a punto de hervir. - Retirar la olla del fuego y añade el romero seco o fresco. Deja que la mezcla repose durante 15-20 minutos para permitir que el romero libere sus propiedades en el agua. - Colar la infusión de romero para quitar las hojas y asegurarte de que el líquido esté limpio. - En un recipiente grande mezclar el jabón líquido neutro con la infusión de romero. - Si se desea un aroma más intenso, añadir unas gotas de aceite esencial de romero y mezclar bien. - Echar el champú casero a una botella limpia y hermética para su almacenamiento. - Para usarlo simplemente mojar cabello y masajear una cantidad adecuada de champú en el cuero cabelludo y el cabello. Enjuagar bien con agua tibia. Este champú casero con romero es suave y adecuado para un uso regular. Cabe recordar que los productos naturales pueden tener una vida útil más corta que los productos comerciales, así que se debe asegurar de almacenarlo en un lugar fresco y oscuro y usarlo dentro de unas semanas para obtener los mejores resultados.News Related - ¿Los gatos pueden reconocerse en el espejo? Si ve a su felino detenido, viéndose en el espejo, puede que solo esté intrigado o a punto de iniciar un juego. Los felinos pueden tener varios comportamientos al verse en el espejo. La destreza que los gatos muestran al realizar algunas actividades o interpretar su entorno, no se ve ... Sin embargo, así como existen muchas cosas que pueden guardarse allí, existen otras, por el contrario que lo mejor es nunca incluirla para ... author: Anastasia Blosser
title: Damaging blooming cherry trees could land you a hefty fine
text:
Cherry blossom fans are being urged to keep a respectful distance from the Sakura trees — or face a $300 fine.
After social media posts showing admirers of the blooms climbing and tugging on branches, the City of Toronto is reminding people to be respectful of the trees during their popular spring bloom.
Anyone who damages or breaks a blossoming cherry tree can be fined $300 — the same amount for any tree damaged in the city.
In 2020, one man was fined a total of $1,150 after he was issued three tickets following an overnight trip to High Park to climb a cherry blossom tree.
“Cherry blossoms, like other trees, can have negative long-term effects if someone plucks off blooms/flowers,” said Alexandra Dinsmore, a communications co-ordinator with the city.
Climbing branches can have immediate and negative long-term effects on the trees’ health, Dinsmore said. Even breaking off a small twig could peel back a strip of bark and create a larger wound on the tree. And once that has happens, the wound can become a point of entry for pests and put stress on the tree as it tries to heal.
Their bloom may be short-lived, but Toronto’s cherry blossoms are a sight to behold.
Their bloom may be short-lived, but Toronto’s cherry blossoms are a sight to behold.
Just walking too close to the trees can make it harder for their roots to soak in water, Dinsmore added.
“When visiting High Park or other cherry blossom locations, please make sure you stick to the trails, keep your dog on a leash and help protect ecologically sensitive areas,” she said. “High Park especially is one of the most significant natural areas in Toronto, with over a third of the park remaining in a natural state.”
Continuous damage can impact a tree’s natural growth patterns, weaken its branch structure, and in more dire situations, shorten their lifespan or make them more susceptible to disease and decay.
To protect the Sakura trees, the city is encouraging visitors taking part in Hanami — the Japanese practice of viewing and enjoying the cherry blossoms — to “protect nature by staying on trails, avoiding climbing trees and properly disposing of litter,” Dinsmore said.
Online, users on Reddit and TikTok have posted photos and videos of visitors climbing the cherry blossom trees and pulling their on branches.
“I was there too and honestly just disappointed in people plucking out, pulling the branches or even climbing the tree,” one user commented.
Anyone who witnesses someone mishandling the blossoms and trees is asked to contact 311.
In 1959, Japanese ambassador Toru Hagiwara presented 2,000 Sakura cherry trees to Toronto on behalf of the people of Tokyo as a gesture of thanks for accepting relocated Japanese-Canadians after the Second World War. Many were planted on the hillside overlooking Grenadier Pond, in High Park. Since then, additional cherry trees have been planted across the city to ensure the gift’s lasting legacy.
The City of Toronto maintains a list of locations where the cherry blossoms annually bloom for a few weeks from late April to early May. The sites include High Park, Edwards Gardens, Trinity Bellwoods Park, Woodbine Park, York University and the University of Toronto’s downtown and Scarborough campuses.
With files from Hayden Godfrey and Osebe Waberi

author: Syndicated Content
title: Trump portrays 2024 race as a Christian battle, akin to D-Day
text:
By Nathan Layne and Tim Reid
(Reuters) – Donald Trump urged Christians on Thursday to support him in the 2024 presidential election, a contest he depicted in religious terms and likened to the great battles of World War Two.
Speaking at a forum for Christian broadcasters in Nashville, the frontrunner for the Republican presidential nomination compared the stakes for the election to D-Day and the Battle of the Bulge and said God’s involvement was needed to rescue the country.
“Today we are in another struggle for survival of our nation,” Trump told the event organized by the National Religious Broadcasters association. “This time the greatest threat is not from the outside of our country, I really believe this: it’s from within.”
“I am here today because I know that to achieve victory in this fight, just like in the battles of the past, we still need the hand of our Lord, and the grace of Almighty God.”
Since launching his campaign in late 2022, Trump has regularly painted the state of the country in apocalyptic terms, seeking to undermine President Joe Biden’s support ahead of a likely rematch for the White House.
APPEALING TO CHRISTIAN BASE
Trump has at times sought to portray the choice facing Americans in November as one of good versus evil, couching his rhetoric in language that appeals to the conservative Christian voters who form a core of his support base.
Conservative Christian voters credit Trump for a series of policy victories including the U.S. Supreme Court’s decision overturning the constitutional right to abortion.
The thrice-married Trump has retained that support even as faces a criminal trial next month in New York that stems from alleged hush money paid to a porn star. It is one of four criminal prosecutions facing Trump, who has derided them all as politically motivated.
“I’m a very proud Christian, actually,” Trump said. “I’ve been very busy fighting and, you know, taking the bullets, taking the arrows. I’m taking them for you and I’m so honored to take them, you have no idea.”
Calling the prosecutors “bad people,” Trump attempted to create common cause with his audience by raising fears that the Biden administration was planning to go after Christians and their organizations – despite a lack of evidence to support such an assertion.
“Christians, they can’t afford to sit on the sidelines in this fight,” Trump said. “The radical left is coming after all of us because they know that our allegiance is not to them. Our allegiance is to our country and our allegiance is to our creator.”
The former president’s appearance in the Tennessee capital is no coincidence. The state is one of many holding primaries and caucuses on “Super Tuesday” on March 5, the biggest day of nominating contests.
Trump is far ahead of Nikki Haley, his sole challenger in the Republican race. He is favored by 30 percentage points in South Carolina’s first-in-the-South primary on Saturday, according to the polling average maintained by website FiveThirtyEight.
In his speech, Trump referred to people imprisoned for the Jan. 6, 2021, attack on the U.S. Capitol as “hostages,” repeating language he has used several times as a way to embrace his supporters involved in the riot.
(Reporting by Nathan Layne in Charleston, South Carolina, and Tim Reid in Washington; Editing by William Mallard)

author: ERIOLUWA ADURA
title: EeZee Concept Wrap-Up 2023 With Greater Plans For 2024
text:
EeZee Concept Wrap-Up 2023 With Greater Plans For 2024
LAGOS – Gospel music in Nigeria has always thrived. With key stakeholders holding the brink of the industry, 2024 might just be the year of blossoming for the promising industry.
What would, continually, form the basis of what we now know today as Nigerian gospel music began to take form until the 19th century.
With Reverend Ransome-Kuti putting together about 43 tracks into an album in 1922 Nigerian Gospel Music has always been a voice. Some of these recordings became standards, such as “Oyigi Yigi Olorun Wa”, “Egbe Awon Angeli”, and “Jesu Oba Alaanu”.
Today, Ransome-Kuti is regarded as the father of Nigerian gospel music and is credited as the first Nigerian to record an album. Nonetheless, there’s always been a need for more platforms for the industry. This is where Eezee Conceptz holds the loudest ovation for 2023.
For EeZee Conceptz, 2023 has been nothing less than a year of breaking the status quo of the Nigerian Industry. The Gospel Music label has not only broken the status quo but has also set new standards for the Nigerian Gospel Music Industry.
EeZee Conceptz, since its inception has always set out to win souls for Christ through music. The group, which also metamorphosed as a label has in the last 12 months consistently created platforms for talented gospel music artists.
Nigerian gospel music is growing at a very fast pace and only the actors can notice or be part of the growth. This is where Eezee belongs. As the unique genre of music has been constructed to be a home of diverse Christian music genres, it has become a rudimentary part of the culture of every Nigerian. With the advent of social media platforms like TikTok, gospel music isn’t bound to the walls of the church any longer. All though, that’s where the root is formed.
There have always been calls for platforms to scale the promising industry and that’s where GGTQ erupted from. The Gospel Groove Talent Quest (GGTQ) 2023 initiative, was put together to give a platform and visibility to young Nigerian gospel ministers. The initiative brought limelight to amazing gospel ministers such as Esther Olabisi, Love Abolade, Ibukun Adelegan, and Asaph Idonuagbe. GGTQ succeeded in setting a clear record in the Nigerian Gospel Music Industry. The Grand finale, which was held at the Terra Kulture, Lagos saw the winner, Esther Olabisi, walk away with the top prize of a three-year recording deal, including a brand-new car, accommodation, and a cash prize. The very first in the history of the Gospel Music Industry.
If there is anything constant this year, it would be the manner in which EeZee Tee, the EeZee Concept Label Boss, went around holding different sessions, imparting knowledge and leading conversations that bent on building structure around the Nigerian gospel music industry.
Recently, the Eezee Tee Conceptz Label Boss, Ezekiel Thankgod Onyedikachukwuwu professionally known as EeZee Tee was awarded the Award of Music Executive of the Year by one of Africa’s finest gospel award organisations. This is evident in the number of artists the label has produced and maintained. The label has in her portfolio Gospel music Artiste such as: Mercy Chinwo, Judikay, Chidinma Ekile, Minsiter GUC, Toby Godwin, Esther Oji, and just recently, Esther Olabisi.
According to the Label Boss, in a recent statement, the label’s target is the youth. Challenging their potentials tightly through positive impartation of God’s Word and power.
With plans to hold the EeZee Global Mindustry Conference in January 2024, next year is definitely a greater year for Nigerian Music Industry, for EeZee Conceptz.
